TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: Provides a format-independent mechanism for transferring data.

span.span: Provides a format-independent mechanism for transferring data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口由类数据传输操作，例如拖放。The interface is used by the class for data transfer operations like drag-and-drop. 当由类实现时方法启用一个数据对象提供多种格式的数据。When implemented by a class, the methods enable a single data object to offer data in multiple formats. 它提供多种格式的数据往往会使数据可供广泛的应用程序相比，如果仅支持单一数据格式。Offering data in multiple formats tends to make the data usable by a wider variety of applications than if only a single data format were supported. 类提供的基本实现接口。The class provides a basic implementation of the interface.

summary.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified data format.

span.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified data format.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetData(string format) cil managed
Public Function GetData (format As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetData(System::String ^ format);
abstract member GetData : string -> obj

param.name: format
param.span: A string that specifies what format to retrieve the data as.

span.span: A string that specifies what format to retrieve the data as.

param.span: See the class for a set of predefined data formats.

span.span: See the class for a set of predefined data formats.

summary.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified format; the data format is specified by a string.

span.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified format; the data format is specified by a string.

returns.span: A data object with the data in the specified format, or **null** if the data is not available in the specified format.

span.span: A data object with the data in the specified format, or **null** if the data is not available in the specified format.

span.span: Checks to see whether the data is available in, or can be converted to, a specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用**GetDataPresent**以确定是否将指定的格式为可用之前调用此数据对象中。Call **GetDataPresent** to determine whether a specified format is available in this data object before calling . 调用来获取此数据对象中可用的所有格式列表。Call to obtain a list of all the formats that are available in this data object.

param.name: format
param.span: A string that specifies what format to check for.

span.span: A string that specifies what format to check for.

param.span: See the class for a set of pre-defined data formats.

span.span: See the class for a set of pre-defined data formats.

param.name: autoConvert
param.span: to only check for the specified format; to also check whether or not data stored in this data object can be converted to the specified format.

span.span: to only check for the specified format; to also check whether or not data stored in this data object can be converted to the specified format.

summary.span: Checks to see whether the data is available in, or can be converted to, a specified format.

span.span: Checks to see whether the data is available in, or can be converted to, a specified format.

returns.span: if the data is in, or can be converted to, the specified format; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . 调用**GetDataPresent**以确定是否将指定的格式为可用之前调用此数据对象中。Call **GetDataPresent** to determine whether a specified format is available in this data object before calling . 调用来获取此数据对象中可用的所有格式列表。Call to obtain a list of all the formats that are available in this data object. 此方法返回 **，则返回 true**时：This method returns **true** when: - *AutoConvert*参数是**true**和数据的指定格式或可转换为指定的格式。The *autoConvert* parameter is **true** and the data is in the specified format, or it can be converted to the specified format. - *AutoConvert*参数是**false**和数据的格式指定。The *autoConvert* parameter is **false** and the data is in the specified format. 此方法返回**false**时：This method returns **false** when: - *AutoConvert*参数是**true** ，数据在指定的格式中不可用，并不能转换为指定的格式。The *autoConvert* parameter is **true** and the data is not available in the specified format and cannot be converted to the specified format. - *AutoConvert*参数是**false**，并且数据不可用指定的格式。The *autoConvert* parameter is **false**, and the data is not available in the specified format.
